about_the_game:
A total of 10 pieces of BGM will be added.
Enjoy listening to new BGM.

■Content
"GO TIGHT"
"CHIMES OF OMEGA"
"SQUARED AIR"
"COUNTERPLAY"
"ORIENT SPECTRA"
"FATAL STROKE"
"WHO IS THE SAVIOUR?"
"DECISIVE BATTLE!!"
"FUSION!!!"
"FIGHT WITH REAL SWORDS"

■How to use
You can set BGM from camp by selecting "Gallery" - "Music", or by selecting a track from the pre-battle loading screen.

This item is obtained with the purchase of WARRIORS OROCHI 4 Ultimate Deluxe Edition or WARRIORS OROCHI 4: The Ultimate Upgrade Pack Deluxe Edition. Please be careful not to purchase the same content twice.

This content is only applicable to the WARRIORS OROCHI 4 Ultimate, it cannot be used in WARRIORS OROCHI 4 base game.
